actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI are waived. The amendments recommended by the Committee on House Administration now printed in the bill and the amendment printed in part 1 of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-11, by Mr. Frost.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 8.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 248 - 171 (Roll no. 23).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 249 - 170 (Roll no. 24).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to establish national voter registration procedures for Federal elections, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2 (national voter registration procedures).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to establish national voter registration procedures for Federal elections, and for other purposes.
